TopicTitle: Problems with the Science & Spaceflight forum?

Articles.Content:
Last weeks I had issues with the  Science & Spaceflight  forum, it refuses to load and give and error screen HTTP ERROR 500
Now this is probably the most active forum folder but other has more posts and not had this issue before, now error 500 is an internal error probably because the DB or web server is unable to handle the load. Wonder if other had this? And if its something the forum managers not the moderators will look into.

It's been fine for me over that time.   I don't recall any of the mod team saying anything about it either.   The forums are prone to a variety of errors from time to time, but I think this one is new.   Keep track of it if it keeps happening and report back, we'll bump it up the ladder then.
